QueryResult.text: select prnote.prid odf_pk, PRNOTE.PRID as timesheet_note_key, PRNOTE.PRID as clarity_timesheet_note_key, NVL(PRNOTE.PRRECORDID, 0) as timesheet_key, prnote.PRCATEGORY as category, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(prnote.PRVALUE, 1000, 1) as timesheet_note, UPDATED.ID as updated_by_key, UPDATED.FULL_NAME updated_by_caption, PRNOTE.PRCREATEDTIME as clarity_created_date, PRNOTE.PRMODTIME as clarity_updated_date, PRNOTE.PRNOTEDATE as timesheet_note_date from prnote prnote JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=prnote.updated_by where 1 = 1 AND PRNOTE.PRTABLENAME='PRTimeSheet'
